job.title: Senior Developer / DevOps Engineer, Infrastructure
job.description: <p>Blueciate Inc is lookin for <strong><u>Senior Developer / DevOps Engineer, Infrastructure</u></strong></p><p><strong><u>US Citizen with Active Secret Clearance.</u></strong></p><p>&nbsp;<strong>Customer&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: DOD</strong></p><p><strong>Location&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: Herndon, VA</strong></p><p><strong>Duration&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;: Multi Year assignment</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS</u></strong></p><p>Because we work on the cutting edge, we need someone who is eager to learn, a creative problem solver, resourceful in getting things to work and productive working independently or collaboratively. In your average week, you will:</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Work closely with our engineering and operations team to build, integrate, test and deploy SAP Analytics Cloud into our production systems.</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Collaborate with colleagues to understand new landscape requirements and help to adapt our solution to meet them</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Develop, test and maintain build system, CI/CD framework and deployment tools</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Automate and streamline deployment processes</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Develop and maintain a monitoring system that overlooks our build landscape</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lead efforts in automation, continuous deployment, build, and configuration management</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Assess new technology projects and tools or migrate our environment to new versions to keep up with the rapid pace of change.</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Establish repeatable process for setup and maintenance of new landscapes in collaboration with the development and operations teams.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS/ SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES</u></strong></p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5+ years of relevant work experience</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Computer Science or Engineering</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building and managing complex build pipelines using tools like Spinnaker, Jenkins</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with AWS, GCP or Cloud Foundry </p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong background in Linux/Unix Administration</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in writing software in languages such as Java, Python, Go, JavaScript, C++ or similar</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker, docker-compose in a production environment. Experience maintaining applications in virtualized environments</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with Source control such as GIT</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to work well in a team as well as independently and have a positive, self-motivated can-do attitude</p><p><strong><u>Bonus if you have experience with:</u></strong></p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Infrastructure software tools such as Terraform, Ansible, and Packer</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Building containerized applications using Kubernetes, Docker</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Building software that must scale to thousands of users concurrently</p><p>•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with monitoring solutions such as Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>WORK EXPERIENCE</u></strong></p><p>5+ years of relevant work experience developing web applications (can include internship or co-op experience)</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Amber K. (Business HR)</strong></p><p>INFO@blueciate.com</p><p>972-607-9081</p><p>www.blueciate.com</p><p><br></p>
